rtd library version 1.0
Copyright (C) 2018 - billnie

Calculate rtd and t
using temperature-resstance data points from a file for the thermistor as input.
Usage: ./rtd [-s -40 -e 150 [-s AD_STEP (default=32)] -v 1 filename
 v = 0, 1,2
start=-40 end=450 step = 5
,1307	// 84.27,-40
,1338	// 86.25,-35
,1368	// 88.22,-30
,1399	// 90.19,-25
,1429	// 92.16,-20
